test_results.comments: Risk: The number of red blood cells in this test is lower than normal, which can indicate anemia due to deficiency, chronic diseases, iron bleeding, trauma ulcers, heavy menstruation, bone marrow disorders, leukemia, myelodysplastic syndromes, old age deficiencies (folate, vitamin B12), or kidney disease. Decreased production of erythropoietin and certain medications can also cause low RBC count.
